cause.description:
Get the god Barry Melrose as the new NHL Commisioner. FUCK BETTMAN!
1. Gary Bettman is ruining the NHL
2. Barry Melrose is a hockey god
3. Save the NHL from going downhill
cause.mission: Get the god Barry Melrose as the new NHL Commisioner. FUCK BETTMAN!
